entry.title: 4' Emergency T8 Tube
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aleddra
Type: Emergency Lights
Price: 76.65

 Emergency T8 Tube

Aleddra’s G3 Emergency LED T8 Tube is a 2-in-1 tube that can be used as a regular T8 lamp and automatically draws power from its built-in battery and lasts more than 90 minutes on battery at 420 lm. It is double-end wired on line voltage (ballast bypass). It comes with dual safety switches on both end caps, which had been documented by a federal agency to be the most effective means of electric shock protection for an LED T8 tube. The LLT-4-EM-T8-G3-15W-50K is a 48", 15 watt Type B double-end wired T8 tube for use in constant-powered, non-switch controlled fixtures that provides 1,890 lumens of 5000K

For use in non-switch controlled fixtures

Must be ordered in case of 25 each

SPECIFICATIONS

 

Length 2ft, 4ft Color 3000K, 3500K, 4000K, 5000K LED Type SMD2835
CRI >80 Input Voltage AC120-277V Battery Operating Temperature 68ºF to 104ºF
Battery Backup Time 90 minutes Wattage 8W (2ft), 15W (4ft) Light Output 960lm (2ft), 1890lm (4ft)
Power Factor >0.92 Luminous Efficiency >120lm/W Light Output When on Battery 420lm at 3.5W
Warranty 5-year Rated Hours 50,000 hours

 

 https://youtu.be/gdoEGna1YcY

entry.title: Lithonia White Thermoplastic Emergency Light - 2 Adjustable Lamp Heads - Battery Backup - Self-Diagnostic
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lithonia Lighting
Type: Emergency Lights
Price: 176.35

Lithonia White Thermoplastic Emergency Light - 2 Adjustable Lamp Heads - Battery Backup - Self-Diagnostic

The Lithonia ELM6L UVOLT LTP SDRT LED emergency light has a white thermoplastic housing impact-resistant, scratch-resistant and corrosion-proof comes with 2 adjustable lamp heads and a 90 minute battery backup run time. This LED emergency light can be mounted on the wall or ceiling and the adjustable optics can be rotated to point in specific directions. Suitable for stairway and hallway lighting.

  • Includes test switch and LED status indicator
  • Can be wall or ceiling mounted
  • Lamp head track and swivel arrangement allows for full range of lamp adjustment
  • Rechargeable lithium ion phosphate battery provides 90 minutes of emergency lighting
  • Self-diagnostics feature continuously monitors AC functionality
  • Automatic 24-hour recharge after a 90-minute discharge
  • Housing is white thermoplastic
  • For use with dual voltage 120/277VAC
  • 5 year warranty
Lamp Heads (2) Adjustable LED
Recharge Time 24 Hours
Testing Self-Testing
Length 13.37 in.
Depth 3.7 in.
Height 5.93 in.
Width 3.7 in.
CA Title 20 Compliant
CEC Compliant
Voltage 120/208/240/277/347
Safety Rating UL Damp Location

entry.title: 4 ft. 5000K, 24W LED Batten Luminaire with Dual Motion Sensors and Emergency Backup
entry.summary:
Vendor: Verbatim
Type: LED Lighting Fixtures
Price: 279.00

4 ft. 5000K, 26W LED Batten Luminaire with Dual Motion Sensors and Emergency Backup

Motion Sensors and Emergency Backup BAT-4FT-W26-C50-MS-NON-EM Part Number: 99585

  • Dual infrared motion sensors - mounted on each end of fixture for accurate motion detection, rotate to optimize desired coverage
  • Bi-level operation - 26.5W, 3000 lumen light output when motion is detected, dims to 40% (10.5W) output when motion is not detected
  • On time and detection zone are adjustable using optional remote control (#98992)
  • Integrated emergency backup system includes battery, test switch and charge indicator - no additional wiring required
  • Nickel metal hydride (Ni-MH) battery, safe for transportation, produces 450lm (4.5W) for 90 minutes in emergency mode.
  • High efficacy - 113 lm/W
  • Ideal for stairwells, passageways, parking garages
  • Includes mounting hardware: junction box adapter plate, v-hooks and chain
  • Suitable for surface or suspended (chain) mounting
  • Side and base knockouts provided for ceiling or wall mounting
  • 5000K - Daylight
  • 100-277V Input voltage
  • 50,000 hour rated lifetime
  • 5-year limited warranty

Available Accessories (Sold Separately)

Batten Remote

98992

FHEM12WW

Damp-location-rated LED emergency fixture (waterproofed variety also available). UL Listed, Dual Voltage Input (120V or 277V). PRODUCT DESCRIPTION:

MaxLite’s MaxLED® Low-Profile Security Light with dusk-to-

dawn photocell and cold-temperature rated internal battery

backup provides versatile and beautiful illumination for outdoor

commercial and industrial environments. Rated for operation in

cold environments, the SECL is also suitable for mounting below

10 feet, with a depth of just 3.86” to comply with the Americans

with Disabilities Act (ADA).

entry.title: DLC 4 ft. LED Batten Luminaire with Dual Motion Sensors, 5K, 3000lm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Verbatim
Type: LED Lighting Fixtures
Price: 159.99

DLC 4 ft. LED Batten Luminaire with Dual Motion Sensors, 5K, 3000lm

Providing the safety and security of light when you need it – saving energy when you don’t. Verbatim’s 4 ft. LED Batten Luminaire with Dual Infrared Motion Sensors provides crisp, clear light when motion is detected and reverts to an energy-saving 33% output when it isn’t. With a heavy-duty, powder-coated, galvanized metal housing and the option for surface or suspended chain installation, the Verbatim LED Batten with Dual Motion Sensors is ideal for stairwells, passageways, and parking garages, or any area with intermittent traffic. Backed by Verbatim’s 5-year limited warranty, the 4 ft. LED Batten Luminaire has an estimated design lifetime of 50,000 hours, resulting in reduced maintenance and replacement costs when compared to fluorescent fixtures.

  • Dual infrared motion sensors – mounted on each end of fixture for accurate motion detection.
  • Sensors rotate to optimize desired coverage.
  • High efficacy - 115lm/W
  • Bi-level operation – 26W, 3000 lumen light output when motion is detected, dims to 33% (8.6W) output when motion is not detected
  • Ideal for stairwells, passageways and parking garages
  • 5000K – crisp, cool, even light with minimum glare
  • Heavy-duty, powder-coated galvanized metal housing
  • Suitable for surface or suspended (chain) mounting
  • Includes mounting hardware: junction box adapter plate, v-hooks and chain
  • Side and base knockouts provided for ceiling or wall mounting
  • ON Time and detection zone are adjustable using optional remote control    (Sold separately: #98892)
  • 100-277V compatible
  • 50,000 hour design lifetime
  • DLC Listed: Stairway and passageway luminaires
  • UL Listed
  • 5-Year Limited Warranty
 

Specifications

 
 
Model BAT-4FT-W26-C50-MS-NON Lumen Output (lm) 3000 lm
Part Number 99305 Efficacy 115.38 lm/W
Wattage 26 CRI >80
Voltage 100-277V Dimmable No

entry.title: LED Dual Remote Head Wet Location Rated
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fulham
Type: Emergency Lights
Price: 22.33

LED Dual Remote Head Wet Location Rated

Double Remote heads for indoor and outdoor applications. Each lamp head is used as part of an emergency lighting system. The remote heads have a plastic housing and LED assembly for use in areas requiring remote lighting. Each lamp head is fully adjustable and glare-free!

entry.title: Black Emergency Light 90 Min. Operation, 120/277V
entry.summary:
Vendor: Fulham
Type: Emergency Lights
Price: 18.98

Black Emergency Light - Incandescent Lamp Heads 90 Min. Operation, 120/277V

Building codes require emergency lighting for situations where power is lost. When everything goes dark, these twin beacons of hope shine brightly so people can move to safety.

The Fulham FireHorse FHEM11-W emergency light is damp location rated and features a universal J-box mounting system for simple installation. It has a compact, low profile, design making it ideal for installation in plain view.

This FireHorse emergency light includes a push-to-test switch for manual testing of the emergency lighting system. The two fully adjustable 5.4-watt DC T5 lamps are powered for up to 90 minutes off of a Ni-Cad battery.

SPECIFICATIONS: 

  • 120-277 Volts
  • Bulb Shape: T5
  • Width: 2.75"
  • Length: 16"
  • Height: 4.7"
  • Emergency Operation: 90 minutes
  • Lamp Head Wattage: 6.7 Watts
  • Mounting: Universal
  • UL Listed: Damp Conditions
  • Battery Type: Ni-Cad

Building codes require emergency lighting so people can safely move to safety when power is lost. This Fulham Firehorse low-profile, contemporary, two-head emergency light has fully adjustable heads a white housing and a high lumen reflector
